description.value: You descend from shirrens who were originally programmed as decoys for the ravenous Swarm. Your chitin is iridescent and creates shimmering patterns that fascinate and distract most other creatures. You can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Feint] at a range of 10 feet, rather than solely while within melee reach of your intended target. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Shimmering Dazzle] action.
